weapon.name: ham sandwich
weapon.victory: The smell of Grandma's ham sandwich causes your attacker to give up and join you for dinner.

weapon.name: bazooka
weapon.description: M20 3.5-Inch Rocket Launcher with 340fps muzzle velocity
weapon.victory: Your attacker has been cut in two with an explosion. Blood and guts drip from your face. Oops maybe not so close next time.

weapon.name: sea whiz
weapon.description: MK 15 Phalanx Close-In Weapons System (CIWS) 4500rpm 20mm rounds
weapon.victory: It might be overkill, but it was fun!

weapon.name: glock
weapon.description: 9mm with 4 inch barrel and 19 round clip
weapon.victory: Double tap. Bang! Bang! Don't you love that sound?

weapon.name: ak-47
weapon.description: 2300fps with a 16inch barrel, adjustable sights, 75 round magazine
weapon.victory: I sprayed 74 rounds without touching him but that one to the head is all it took.

weapon.name: hand grenade
weapon.victory: Wow! That was cool! Where did his eyeball go?

weapon.name: crossbow
weapon.victory: William Tell has nothing on me.

weapon.name: fake dog poop
weapon.description: Made in China vulcanized rubber dog poop
weapon.victory: The best Amazon sells! Your attacker will remember that black eye next time

weapon.name: multitool
weapon.victory: Next time I won't use the spoon first.

weapon.name: whistle
weapon.description: Coach's whistle with 120db of piercing pain
weapon.victory: Reminds me of Ms. Fartle, my high school gym teacher.

weapon.name: stink bomb
weapon.victory: Damn! That had unintended consequences.

weapon.name: blow dryer
weapon.description: Your sister's industrial strength blow dryer.
weapon.victory: Your attacker didn't stand a chance with the blow power.

weapon.name: wrench
weapon.description: If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a dodge ball.
weapon.victory: Well I guess he can't dodge dodge balls either.

weapon.name: claw hammer
weapon.victory: Well that is going to leave a mark.

weapon.name: bb gun
weapon.description: Be careful, you'll shoot your eye out.
weapon.victory: Yep, he lost his eye.

weapon.name: rubber band
weapon.description: Your teacher said: "Who did that?" (memories from days past)
weapon.victory: That left a big whelp on your attacker.

weapon.name: chocolate puddin' cup
weapon.victory: Now he is going to have to go home and wash his clothes.

weapon.name: candy wrapper
weapon.victory: What? How did I even win?

weapon.name: pop can
weapon.victory: Double the caffeine, BEOTCHES!

weapon.name: cookie jar
weapon.victory: Well, looks like I am going to have to buy another cookie jar.

weapon.name: plush pony
weapon.victory: Ponies kick butt!

weapon.name: rubber duck
weapon.victory: I dunno. That was weird.

weapon.name: fish hook
weapon.victory: Hook, line, and sinker!

weapon.name: deck of cards
weapon.victory: Gambit style!!

weapon.name: canteen
weapon.victory: He was a light weight

weapon.name: hamster
weapon.victory: Mighty mouse has competition.

weapon.name: clay pot
weapon.victory: Gross. Just gross.

weapon.name: rusty nail
weapon.victory: "MF! $#@%" your enemy screams as he steps on your trap.

weapon.name: jar of jam
weapon.victory: Now he smells of elderberries.

weapon.name: beaded bracelet
weapon.description: Awww, someone lost their friendship bracelet.
weapon.victory: Power of friendship!

weapon.name: wet noodle
weapon.description: Linguini, Fettuccine, Spaghetti, I don't know it is wet and slimy.
weapon.victory: Well at least he slipped on the wet noodle. That could have ended very differently.
